column3: Move along, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>. Nothin' to see here.
Sorry, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>, but I've nothin' to sell till the next shipment comes.
You must progress further through the Shadowbringers main scenario in order to access this vendor's wares.
Once you have made a substantial contribution to the safety of Lakeland, Kholusia, Amh Araeng, Il Mheg, the Rak'tika Greatwood, and the Tempest, you will be able to trade with this vendor.

You're in luck, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>. Shipments of goods from all over are finally makin' their way to the Crystarium. If you're willin' to part with a few bicolor gemstones, mayhap we can strike a bargain.
You may now trade with Gramsol!
Collect bicolor gemstones to trade for a variety of goods.
Anything you fancy, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>? If you've bicolor gemstones to spend, I'm sure I have something you're after.
I am terribly sorry, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>, but I have nothing to sell at present.
I am terribly sorry, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>. A new shipment of wares is due any day now.
I have the most wonderful news! We've just received a shipment of goods to sell. Perhaps we have something to your liking?
You may now trade with Pedronille!
